law.catch_line: Duties of state fire marshal and chief state building official relating to fire loss.

text.section: The chief state building official shall enforce and administer all applicable provisions of the Kentucky Building Code, including all the provisions designed for the prevention of fire loss, and shall have all the powers and duties awarded by KRS Chapter 198B and the Kentucky Building Code.
The state fire marshal shall head the Division of Fire Prevention in the department.
